trans-unit.source: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.
trans-unit.target: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.

trans-unit.source: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.
trans-unit.target: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.

trans-unit.source: See the <linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the <linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.

trans-unit.source: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.
trans-unit.target: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.

trans-unit.source: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.
trans-unit.target: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.

trans-unit.source: This OpenConnection function is called near the top in all of the functions that follow.
trans-unit.target: This OpenConnection function is called near the top in all of the functions that follow.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>sqlsrv_query()</linkText><title></title> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>sqlsrv_query()</linkText><title></title> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of [sqlsrvfetcharray()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-fetch-array.php).
trans-unit.target: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of [sqlsrvfetcharray()](http://php.net/manual/en/function.sqlsrv-fetch-array.php).

trans-unit.source: In SQL Database the <linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title> property and the <linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title> object can be used to auto-generate <linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title> values.
trans-unit.target: In SQL Database the <linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title> property and the <linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title> object can be used to auto-generate <linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title> values.

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:
trans-unit.target: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:

trans-unit.source: -Insert a row of data, Update another row of data
trans-unit.target: -Insert a row of data, Update another row of data

trans-unit.source: -Commit your transaction if the insert and update were successful and rollback the transaction if one of them was not
trans-unit.target: -Commit your transaction if the insert and update were successful and rollback the transaction if one of them was not

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see <linkText>Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see <linkText>Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP</linkText><title></title>.
